summary: Frontend testing of OMEGA Dashboard P0 features: TileHelpTabs, QuickHelpTips, CommsAvailabilityPanel with Radio/SDR, Node Detail Drawer with GPS mini-map, and Power tile. All 18 features tested and PASSED with MOCKED data.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED by design - GPS coordinates, comms status, power data, node data all use mock data
TileHelpTabs component provides standardized Help/Troubleshoot/Legend tabs across Camera, Security, Music, Power tiles
QuickHelpTips collapsible component renders in Camera, Security, Music tiles (4 instances found)
CommsAvailabilityPanel shows Radio/SDR as new transport method with proper status colors
Node Detail Drawer opens correctly with GPS section showing coordinates, fix status, satellites, and mini-map
Power tile shows battery percentage, voltage, current, temperature, charge sources, and consumption breakdown
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by allyApi, getMockCommsStatus(), getMockPowerData()
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 features tested and working. Key test IDs: tile-help-tabs, tile-tab-help, tile-tab-troubleshoot, tile-tab-legend, help-tab-content, troubleshooting-tab-content, legend-content, quick-help-tips, comms-availability-panel, comms-methods, comms-card-lan, comms-card-mesh, comms-card-sdr, selected-comms-info, degraded-explanation, node-details-drawer, gps-card, node-mini-map, power-tile, power-help-btn, camera-help-btn, security-help-btn, music-help-btn

P0.1_TileHelpTabs_renders.details: TileHelpTabs component renders with Help/Troubleshoot/Legend tabs in Camera, Security, Music, Power tiles

P0.1_QuickHelpTips_collapsible.details: QuickHelpTips collapsible component renders in Camera, Security, Music tiles (4 instances found)

P0.1_Camera_help_button.details: Help button (?) on Camera tile opens Camera Help view with standardized tabs

P0.1_Security_help_button.details: Help button (?) on Security tile opens Security Help view with standardized tabs

P0.1_Music_help_button.details: Help button (?) on Music tile opens Music Help view with standardized tabs

P0.2_Radio_SDR_transport.details: CommsAvailabilityPanel shows Radio/SDR as a new transport method

P0.2_status_badges.details: Transport status badges show '2 UP', '1 WEAK', '2 DOWN' correctly

P0.2_degraded_explanation.details: Clicking degraded Mesh card shows 'What Degraded means' explanation panel with current issue, likely causes, and how to fix

P0.2_sending_via_bar.details: 'Sending via X' bar updates when selecting different transports (LAN/Wi-Fi, Radio/SDR, Mesh/LoRa)

P0.3_node_drawer_opens.details: Node Detail Drawer opens when clicking node avatar

P0.3_gps_section.details: GPS section shows coordinates (37.774900, -122.419400), fix status (3D), satellites (12)

P0.3_mini_map.details: Mini map renders with node pin and accuracy circle (±10 ft) in GPS section

P0.3_open_in_maps.details: 'Open in Maps' button visible below mini map

P0.4_power_tile_renders.details: Power tile renders with battery percentage (72%), voltage (12.4V), current (0.85A), temperature (28°C)

P0.4_net_flow_indicator.details: Power tile shows net flow indicator (Discharging)

P0.4_charge_sources.details: Power tile shows charge sources grid (Solar, AC, Vehicle, USB-C)

P0.4_consumption_breakdown.details: Power tile shows consumption breakdown bar

P0.4_power_help_button.details: Power tile help button opens Power Help view with standardized tabs

screenshots_taken: 03_comms_cards.jpeg - Transport cards (LAN, Mesh, SDR, SMS, HF)
28_sending_via_mesh.jpeg - Sending via Mesh/LoRa with degraded explanation

mocked_apis_list: allyApi.getNodeStatus() - returns node details with GPS data
getMockCommsStatus() - returns comms status: LAN=UP, Mesh=WEAK, SDR=UP, SMS=DOWN, HF=DOWN
getMockPowerData() - returns power data: 72% battery, 12.4V, 0.85A, 28°C, Discharging
Mock GPS coordinates: 37.774900, -122.419400 with 3D fix and 12 satellites
